auto embed.no perms: You do not have the required permissions to use this command.
auto embed.auto_commands_description: This command allows you to enable or disable auto-embeds for the current channel.
auto embed.auto_commands_description_add: Add this or any other channel to the list of auto-embeds.
auto embed.auto_embed_added: Auto-embeds have been enabled for this channel.
auto embed.auto_embed_removed: Auto-embeds have been disabled for this channel.
